All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Address
Class for storing address.
Checker
Main logic of server, connect to clients, send data and check result.
Client
Main class of client.
ClientsManager
Class which observe for clients and their states.
Config
Class for storing config.
JsonReader
Reader a config from json file.
Nod
Class which response for accept connection, run echo and write answer.
Reader
Interface for reading config from stream.
ReaderWithTimer
Read from bytes with fixed delay.
Server
Main class of realization of server.
Solver
Interface solver, it response for finding composite number in list.
SolverSeq
Solver which uses default stream to find composite number.
SolverStream
Solver which uses parallel stream to find composite number.
Status
All statuses of clients.

Task.
TaskId
Id of task
TaskManager
Class which observe for tasks.
